juzs.text: Yallay addunyaa kee akeerâ reeda gabat le nabaah kay kayri kay ginoh amol yemeggeh, kaadu usuk ummaanimil qamal geyto li kinni
Usuk rabaa kee manó gine rabbi kinni sinaamey sin yaqiyyiruh, taamâ maqaanéh siinik yayse num yamixxiguh, kaadu usuk mayso li tu kaak mataysaay, dambi cabti li kinni, kaal yuduure marah

Usuk Yallay malcina qaran sittak amol inkigide akkuk gine kinni. wagta numow Yallih ginót hebelto fulaa kee sissinaané matablak, tokkel qaraanâ fanah wagitto gacam gacisey, usuk tama nabna luk baquu kee qanxixu kaat maay tablee
Tohuk lakal Kaadu wagitto qaraanâ fanah namma adda gacam gacisey, wagta numow kunti qunxaane luk bura luk kol aduurelek, Yallih ginot hebelto cooca able kalah, is wagittok taqabba itteh
Yalli nummah, xiibitak addunyâ qaran ifta cutuukat bilisneeh, sheytoonâ geedano tet abne, kaadu akeeral girâ digaalá keenih massosne axcuk
Kaadu isi Rabbil koroosite mari jahannam digaalá le, kaadu is manxu uma gacsimeynaay
Usun teetit qambisiman waqdi, teetiy faciyyi gibdah muxxak kaxxa xongoló yaabben

Jahannam korosuh abte naqbih gibdah taggiggiriqqeem xayossu hayte, sinaamak horta tet addal qambisiminnaan waqdi tet loynissa malayka addunyal ta digaalak sin meesiisa farmoyti siinih mamattoo axcuk ken esserta
Yeey, nummah meesiise nel yemeeteh iyyan, tokkel kaa dirabbosneeh, Yalli hebeltoh iimiy oobise mali inne, isin tu hinniton kaxxa fingqat yan mara akke wayteenik
Kaadu usun woh aalamuk: nummah nanu nek iyyaanam cakki maabbah aabbinninoy, hinnay tu raaqisa kas le mara akkķinninoy, urta giráh mara akkuk manannino iyyen
Tokkel usun sinni dambi (koroosannu kinnuk) yeelemeeniih, tokkel urta girah marah finqaa kee Yallih Racmatak yaxxeereenim tanay
Diggah, ablekal sinni Rabbik meesita mari, dambi cabtii kee kaxxa galató le
Sinni maxcó qellissoonu, hinnay taybulloonu, Yalli sin alilwat tanim yaaxigi kinni
Gino gineh yan Rabbi mannal aaxige waa qellissaanam kee taybulleenim? Usuk xuwawli, adda yaaxigi kinnik
Kaa kinni baaxó siinih madabah sahhalossemik tet deraafel gexaay kay rizqhi akuma, kaadu ugut kaâ fanah yakke Qhiyaamah ayro
Korosey isin sinni teemeneenii qaraanal yan Rabbi Baaxó siinil xuumusaamak is gibdi angoyyih tangayye waqdi
Hinnak isin sinni teemeneenii qaraanal yan Rabbi arraaqi le caacay siinil ruubaamak? toysa korosey isin yi meesisso le inna aaxigetton digaalá tablen waqdi
Yalli xiibiteh nummah, keenik naharsi mari sinni farmoytit dirabboyseemil, tokkel ken essecekkehik yi assacokki manna keenil teellee? Ken bayisne wagqdi
Kaadu mayablaanaa keenik amól tan haadá galwá fakta waqdii kee xambaqta waqdi takkem? raddaamak tet tabbixeeh dacrissam matan Racmaan kinni Rabbi akke waytek, diggah usuk ummaanim yabali kinni

Hinnak korosey tah iyyaay tah ni mara kak ittaanaah sin cattam? yalli sin digaalam faxek, Racmaan kinni Rabbi akke waytek, koroosite mari tû bagul mayan sheetan keenit abah yan duquurisiyya akke waytek
Hinnak ah iyyaay, Yalli isi rizqhi siinik yibbixek siinih taceem? Wonna hinnay koroosite mari Nummaak caddok tatur kee cakkik giltaanamih bagul yeedeen
Tokkel Foocah radak gexa num yayse innaa tirtóh hinnay massowwu iyyeh massa le gitat gexa num yaysee

Nabiyow!Keenik ixxic :Yalla kinni suge waytik sin gintem, kaadu aytiy edde taabbeenii kee intiitay edde tableeniiy, sorkocobbaxittéy edde kaskassowtaana siinih gintem, korosey Yallih niqmatak faatittaanam siinik dagoh
Ixxic Nabiyow:Yalla kinni baaxô bagul sin ginteeh sin fixiixissem, kaadu kaâ fanah gaaboysimetton cisab kee galtoh
Kaadu koros: axagni maa waqadiiy isin numma yacee mara tekkeenik itta
Nabiyow:cagalah, Qhiyaama edde solta waktih ixxiga Yallih garil tan, kaadu cagalah anu baxxaqqa le meesiise kinniyo keenik ixxic
Koros digaalá xayyowtem table waqdi, koroosite marak foocitte taameh, tah teetiy esseritak assaxeeruk sugteeni keenik iyyan
Ixxic Nabiyow korosuk:yoh warisa! Yalli yoo kee yollih yan mara qidek hinnay neh xuwaaweh nee udurruse yekkek, koros iyyi cateleeh qansarissa digaalák
Ixxic Nabiyow: usuk Racmaan kinni Rabbi nanu kaa nummasneeh kaal kelitne, tokkel xayuk aaxigetton digaalá obtuwayta waqdi cakki gitak baxxaqqa le hoxat tanim sin kinnik nee kinnim
Ixxic Nabiyow: yoh warisay! sin lee baaxot fuuqunteh maacissek, iyyi siinih baaheleeh daritta leey gexxa? (num mabaaha Yallak sá)
Nuun- (edde faxem Yalli yaaxige) Yalli Qhalam kee yaktube mari uktubbu haamal xiibite
Atu Nabiyow ku Rabbi koh yecee niqmatih sabbatah cabuli akke waytaamal xiibite
Kaadu diggah atu galtoy aggiriqqe sinni litoomul xiibite
Kaadu diggah atu naba caalat maqaaneh bagul tantoomul xiibite
Xayi waktit Nabiyow atu ablettooh, usun (koros kinnuk) ablelon
Siinik cabulem kinni num abletton koo kinnik ken kinnim
Diggah ku Rabbi usuk ixxigah yayse Rabbi kinni kay gitak makkooteh yan marat, kaadu usuk ixxigah yayse Rabbi kinni kay gital tirri iyyeeh kaal diggi iyye marat
Toysa isi diinil diggi xicaay moggolin koo kee Qhuraan dirabboyse mara
Kaadu Nabiyow atu usun faxe waanamak tu cabtaamal keenih xabbacowtek, usun kaadu koh xabbacoowaanam faxan
Kaadu ummaan numwy xiiba maggoy bayoytah yanih yab moggolin
Cami maggo numwy sittal hayah sinam fanal gexaah yangagayyeh yab moggolin
Cinnaaneynay kayri celli haytam gibdi waasoh waasay caddok taturlih yaniy, dambi maggoh yab moggolin
Koroosanni maggah Sorkocobbaxi kak kafe numvuy, tohuk lakal ilmoytah yani kinni
Usuk a weelot kah weeloysimem, maali gaddaa kee xalay mangintah sabbata
Ni-aayoota (Qhuraan kinnuk) kaal tankirriyime waqdi, ah naharsi marih hayyayyoona iyya anqasah
Xayi uddurul (waktil) kate waa bedu kaak heenno sanal
Diggah nanu makki mara qulul kee qabaarat niqiyyire bustaan mara kah niqiyyire innah, usun subci wakti kay caxammixu tumaleelak qellut yargiqoonu waanamah xiibiten waqdi
Yalli faxek maxaccinnon
Tokkel ku Rabbih kabuk usun xiinit anuk mire (giráy kaa carrisse kinnuk) kaa mireh
Tokkel usuk data gommod ceelak maacise
Tokke sittah kayam kaayeenih maacisen waqdi
Sinni buqree kee sinni caxammixuh waqlal kuula kaa yargaqu waah orbisa mara tekkeenik ittak iyyen
Tokkel gexeenih, usun tutuc axcuk
Ta saaku tumaleela bustaan siinil cule waytaama ittak axcuk
Kuuleenih loowiteenimil dudda le mara sinni akka luk
Tokkel usun sinni bustaan carareeh gombod yekkem yublen waqdi, diggaluk nanu baditneeh gitak hoxneh nan iyyen
Usun Bustaan sinni bustaan kinnim yismiten waqdi: Wonna hinnay nanu kay kayrik baxaysite mara nekke, tumaleela cakkik kak waasneemih sabbatah iyyen
Keenik kas kee kayrih yayse num: siinik maxaccinniyoo, Yalla ma saytunnossaanaa, Yalli saytunih itteenih, hinnay Yalli faxek itteenih
Nanu ni Rabbi kaah yaguude saytunnoysiyyah kaa saytunnosna, diggah nanu ninni nafsi yudlume marah sugne tumaleela cakkik waasneemil
Tokkel gari garut keenik yufkune sitta assacakkuk
Booley nee gee finqgaaw! Diggah nanu caddok tatre marah sugne, Yallih amri cinneeh tumaleela cakkik waasne waqdi
Ni Rabbi nanu abneh nan umaanek kaal gacneemih sabbatah, tama bustaanak taysem nee ciggiilisele, diggaak nanu ninni Rabbik qafuu kee muxxo qaagitna
Addunyâ digaalá Tonna. Diggah akeerâ digaalá wohuuk naba, usun woh yaaxige mara akkinnoonuy waasimak yenen
Diggah Yallak meesita mari, sinni Rabbih xaqul waara niqmat elle yan jannoota lon
Tokkel muslimiin koros inna maay abna galtol? (mabna)
Maca litoonuu Mannal mekeltaanaa? muslimiin kee koros galtol missoowaanah ittaanamal
Hinnak qaraanak oobe kitaabay elle barittaana litoonuu
Diggah isin faxinnaanim addak kak doorittoonuh
Hinnak xagnittey xiibal siinih diggosneh iyya nellih litoonuu Qhiyaamah ayrô fanah, diggaluk isin sinnih faxxaanam mekeltaanamal
Nabiyow! ken (koros kinnuk) esserey :woo meklay abiteeni geyoonu waanamah waas keenik yekke num miyyaay
Hinnak Yallat agleytiitih yan maray usun iyyaanamah waas keenih yakkey faxaanamah ken cata maay lon, toysa usun iyyaanamat numma yacee mara yekkeenik sinni agleytit baahoonay
Qhiyaamah ayróy Yallî sarbay ni sarba ceele wayta tamballayu waytaah, sinam sujuud fanah edde seecimtay, koros sujuud edde abtam duude wayta

Intiita keenik sabruuruttaah taqunxeeh iroh fayya tet haanam maduudaanaay xixxibaané kee qunxaané ken buulta Yallih digaalah gibdah, Nummah usun addunyal sugen waqdi sujuuduh seecimak sugen qaafiyatah nagay anuk, tokkel usun kaxxamariinoh sujuud abak ma suginnon
Toysa Nabiyow ta Qhuraan dirabboysa maraa kee yoo sittah cab, usun kak aaxige waan gambik ken lagsennooh ken digaalennok
Kaadu dago wakti (xokobbiseyyo), keenih abenno dambitte ossitaanamkeh diggaluk yi digaalá gibdih korosul
Hinnak Nabiyow atu a farmoh gudduusiyyal galtó ken essertaah, usun woo galtoh magoyta elle tiqilsee mara yekkeenii kah aamine waanam
Hinnak usun qellittem elle tan luucal macfuuzuy, qellittaamih ixxigay usun faxaanam kak yaktubeeni maay lon

Toysa Nabiyow atu isi Rabbih meklal isbiraay, kullumti kataysah (Nabii Yuunus kinnuk) inna makkin naqabuu kee sabri sinnah, usuk isi Rabbih qoxxitit (kaxxa faxewaynaan kinnuk) kullumti bagih addat anuk seece waqdi
Kay Rabbih kabuk Racmat kaa eleele wannay, qambisimak yen kullumti baguk baaxok booxal usuk ilqime numuh anuk
Tokkel kay Rabbi isi farmoh kaa dooreeh, meqe marih num kaa abe. (ambiyaa kee farmoytit kinnuk)
Nummah Nabiyow koroosite mari Qhuraan yaabbe waqdi, usun sinni intiitat Koo qawlusaanaah koo yankiseenim xayyossu haan koh lon naqabuh, kaadu usuk diggah cabuli kok iyyan kuuxe waynaanah
Usuk (Qhuraan kinnuk) ginoh (woh seehadaa kee jinni kinnuk) kassis akke waytek kalah tu hinna
Alcaaqha is Qhiyaamâ migaqwak migaaqak teynay is nummah takku waytam yascasse kinni
Qhiyaamay cakkil takku wayta macaay
Maca koo tiysixxigeeh Nabiyow Qhiyaamay cakkil takku wayta
Samuud deqsitta kedoó (woh Nabii Saalic mara) kee Qaad deqsitta kedó (woh Nabii Huud mara) Qhiyaamay meesî gibdah lubbî taatuki deqsitta dirabbosseh
Tokkel samuuduh tu gactek, Yalli caddok taturte xongolot ken finqise
Kaadu Qaad deqsita marah tu gactek, Yalli kaxxa xongoloo kee xabca le caacayay caddok tatret ken finqise

Yalli malcina baraay bacra ayroy sitta katattay aggirriqqe sinni caacay keenit ruube, tokkel woo baritteé kee woo ayroorah addat sinaamay rabtey qangalaltay tamiirâ laqiibay gorrittey inaaqah tani ceelah ken table
Tokkel woo marak numwy finqite kalah raaqe keenik maay table
Kaadu firqawnaay, kaak naharat korosuh suge maraá kee magaalol elle korsen mari (Nabii Luut mara kinnuk) kaxxa dambi luk yemeeten
Tokkel usun sinni Rabbih farmoyta cineenih, wonnaluk Yalli gibdi mabbuxuh ken yibbixe (digaalá kinnuk)
Diggah nanu lee caddok taturteeh kulliimik amo ciggilte waqdi, doynikit Nabii Nuucùû luk sin nukkuqeeh sin raaqisne
Woo abto kassis siinih abne, kaadu raaqissa ayti tet raaqissamkeh
Tokkel baantat inki adda fuuxa fuuxumta waqdi
Kaadu baaxoo kee qaleelá le aroocak tamukkuqeeh, inki atkah sittat tamuttukeeh bulá takke
Toysa too waqdi Qhiyaama soltah
Kaadu qaran qanxixaah, usuk woo ayró boolaataah Qande luk maraaqa
Kaadu malayka kay deraafel gactaah, woo ayró ku Rabbih qarshi malaykak bacra malaykatti isi amol yakkuqe
Too ayró sinaamey cisab kee galtoh Yallî fooca sin maksan, isin qellissaanamak tu kaak maqellitta
Le kitab migdi gabah kah yontocowwime numuh tugactek wallê gibdah yi kitab ibbixa ikriya iyya
Diggah anu asmatuk suge, inni cisaabat (galtot) garayuwaam
Toysa usuk akeeral ruffu kaa hayta mano le
Jannatay fayya leh addal yan
Jannatti mexexi kaa daggaasita marah xayih
Keenik iyyaanah:akumaay, aquba ruffû xica tatrusutten meqe taamáh sabbatah, taturte ayroorah addat
Kaadu Le kitab guri gabah kah yontocowwime numuh tu gactek, maganey yi kitab yoh antacawwime wannay iyya
Kaadu inkinnah maa xaginniyo yicisab kinnim
Maganey addunyal abe rabi yi manoh ellecabo akkinnay
Yi maali yoh xiqem mali Yallih digaalák
Yi duddaa kee reedá yok gexxeh
Iyyan jahannam malaykak:kaa abbixaay wonnaluk kay namma gaba fillat kaak axuwa silsilatat
Tohuk lakal jaciim deqsitta girá kaa culusa tet niqna tammoysamkeh
Tohuk lakal silsilatay xexxaarah malcina tabanih cusul yakket kaa culusa iyyan
Diggah usuk addunyal Yallay nabah inkittinaanel aamanuk masuginna
Kaadu tu dagoyta yaskameenimih sinam ilsiisak masuginna addunyal
Toysa ta saaku usuk takkķel isil xayi numuy digaalá isik waasa mali
Kaadu hebeltô maaqo mali girâ marak caxta qasaalayi akke waytek
Ama qasaalayi takmem matan dambileelay koroosannuk kate wayte akke waytek
Xiibitah an isin tableenimil
Kaadu able waytaanamal xiibita
Diggah ta Qhuraan Yallih maxcoy massakaxxa le farmoyti yakriye kinni
Kaadu usuk (Qhuraan kinnuk) gadabê maxco hinna, kaa nummassaanam siinik dagoh
Kaadu usuk qellittem aaxigeh iyya ginnilih maxco hinna, isin kassittaanaah elle kaskassowtaanam siinik dagoh
Usuk ginó gineh yan Rabbih kabuk oobe kitaaba
Kaadu Nabii Mucammad Asale nanu axce wayneemik tu nel diraabah ginnaasitinnay
Nanu diggah qanxaffe luk migdi gabah kaa abbaxuk neneeh kaa digaalak nen
Tohuk lakal canti ramad kaak argaquk nen
Tokkel siinik ni digaalák kaa reebisaamih dudda num mali
Kaadu diggah, Qhuraan kassiisi Yallak meesita marah
Kaadu diggah nanu naaxigeh, siinik diggah ama Qhuraan dirabboysa mara
Kaadu diggah ama Qhuraan dirabboysaanam, Qhiyaamah ayró koroosite maral kaxxa nadaama akke le
Kaadu diggah, usuk (Qhuraan kinnuk) nummay asmat le kinni
Toysa saytunnos! ku Rabbih migaaqay naba
Korosuk num raq sinni digaaláy keenil obtu wayta essereeh kallace
Usuk korosuh tet essereeh keenik tet waasa num mayan, yalli tet oobisam faxek
Yallay fayya leeh nabna leh kabuk taniih keenik cattam matan
Malaykaa kee jibriil Yallâ fanah tawqe ixxi kak kontom alfih sanat yakke ayróh addat
Toysa isbir Nabiyow qaxmeqe sabrih
Diggah, usun (koros kinnuk) digaalá xer iimiy akke waytah yablen
Kaadu nanu xayiimiy takku waytah tet nable
Amah takkem Qaran diyaayisen lakqoo kee nacaasih innah gaca ayró
Kaadu qaleelá bisu le suufuy fikiikiseeniy caacayat gexah inna takke ayró
Elle xayi elle xayi essere waah, kacnoyti kacnoyta essere waa ayro
Yalli woo ayro sitta ken yaybulleeh, sitta yaaxigeeniih sittah xiqaanam malon. tokkel umeyni (korosta kinnuk) isi nafsik isi xaylo fidah yaceem faxaah sangeela Qhiyaamah ayroh digaalak
Kaadu isi barraa kee isi toobokoyta fidah yaceem faxa
Kaadu kay kedoy (gulub kinnuk) kaa orbissaah kaa reebissah tani fidah yaceem faxa
Baaxô bagul inkih enni ittaamat waddiimaamih sangel le, tohuk lakal Yallih digaalák naggoowam faxa woo fidat
Caagid usuk elle faxa inna hinna, diggah is ladá deqsitta giráy hadiidigtaah habuubugta kinni
Is arab siibtá gira niqnâ gibdah
Isî fanah secta iimaanat derre cabeeh, Yallaa kee Yallih farmoytih amri cine mara
Kaadu sectah maalu kobxiseeh, Yallih cakki kak aceewee mara
Diggah seehadayti baakerliiy, qaraarakolih (qambaxxaglih) anuk ginniime
usuk umaane kaa xagte tet tekkek qaraarako li kinni (qaxbaxxaagite)
Kaadu maqaané kaa xagteeh gaddalitek kaxxa gabâ gibda li kinni
Salat abá koh raqtuh immay
Woh umman sinni salaatih baguk kate waa mara kinni
Kaadu usun yimixxige cakki (maglab kinnuk) maalut kak yan mara kinni
Kallaca tu malii kee kallace waa tu malih
Kaadu usun cisab kee galtoh ayró (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) nummaysa mara
Kaadu usun sinni Rabbih digaalák meesita mara
Tama meesih kah meesitaanam, diggaluk ken Rabbih digaalá yaamineenim mali (baggibda mali)
Kaadu usun sinni sammooma (sambooba) dalwak dacrisa mara
Sinni gennaaqoh agabuu kee sinni say naqoosay ken gabá timlike akke waytek, toysa diggah usun qeemu maloonuuy, yassacakken mara hinnon
Tokkel tamahak kalihim faxeeh, gurrise mari, woo mari usun caddok taturleela kinni
Kaadu usun sinni amaanootaa kee sinni xagna dacrisa mara kinni
Kaadu usun sinni sumaaqittel soolaah, wohul diggi iyya mara kinni
Kaadu usun sinni salat le waktil dacrisa mara kinni
Woo mari jannootah addal massakaxxa leeh, ruffu iyya
Nabiyow koroosite mari fillitte kadeedisak koo fanah edde yardem maca lee
Kok migdaa kee gura le kabul horta hortah gaca mara akkuk
Kulli seehadayti keenik, Yalli waara niqmat le jannat ise culsaamah sangeelaa
Aleey caagid usun elle yakkalen inna hinna, diggah nanu usun yaaxigeenimik ken ginne. (woh daacoyta kinnuk)
Ayrô mawqooqii kee ayrô kormaami Rabbil (Yalli isi nafsi edde faxak) xiibita diggah nanu dudda linoomul
Keenik yayse mara ciggiilisnaamal, kaadu hebeltô seehadayti keenik nek mayassaqqa, ken bayisnam fannek abe nee kaltam matan
Toysa usun Sinni baatilit giirisoonay ken ixxic, kaadu sinni addunyal digritoonay ken ixxic ken ayróy (woh Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) kah xagnisimeenit ongoorowwu iyyaanam fanah
Magooqak sissikuk yawqen ayró, addunyal sinni yallittey xeet kee cooxuk tanî fanah tet yaqbudoonuh asassakuk kah gexak sugen innah
Intiita keenik meesih rammitak buraa kee qunxaané ken buulta, woh addunyal kah xagnisimak sugen ayró (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) kinni
Diggah, nanu Nabii Nuuc kay marâ fanah kaa rubneh, qansarissa digaalá keenih tamaatek naharal, ku mara meesis iyyaanamal
Nabii Nuuc iyyeh: yi maraw! Diggah anu siinih meesisso kak baxxaqqa le farmoyta kinniyo
Yalla uqbudaay qibaada kaah caglisa, kaadu kaak meesitaay, yamri oggola

Tohul sin dambitte siinih cabeleeh, qumri siinih wadirroyse le yimixxige waktî fanah, Diggah Yalli mekle wakti (Raba kinnuk) yamaate waqdi, mawadirroysima, isin woh yaaxige mará akkinnitoonuy iimaanâ fanah asissikuk tenen
Nabii Nuuc iyyeh:yi Rabbow diggah, anu inni mara kol yaamanoonuh baraay laqó ken seeceh
Tokkel Yi seeco tu keenih mossinna kudimik sá

Kaadu diggah, anu keenih seecinnaanih waqdi dambi keenih cabtuh sinni feeraari sinni aytiitat heeniih (axcem yaabbeenimik) sinni sarat yumbududeeniih, (yoo yableenimik) koroosannul yeedeeniih, kaxxa mariinoh kaxxa mariiniten iimaan oggolaanamak
Tohih lakal diggah, anu xongolo fayya haak keenih seece
Tohih lakal diggah, anu xongolo fayya keenih heeh, tutuccah tutuccu keenit exce
Tokkel sinni Rabbil dambi cabti essirita keenik exce, diggah usuk maggom dambi cabti li kinnik
Yallal tuduureeniih, dambi cabti kaal esseritteenik, sittallakleh rob siinih ruube le
Kaadu maaluvy xalay farakka siinih heele, kaadu wahoobah yan basaatin siinih heele, kaadu weeqaytitte siinih heele
Maca liton Yallih nabnak kah meesite waytaanam
Nummah Yalli ranko rankoh sin ginek
Yalli malcina qaran sittak amol massoowak elle gine inna matablaanaa
Kaadu alsá ken (Qaranwa kinnuk) addal diifu abeeh, ayró ifa faanus abe
Kaadu Yalli baaxok sin gineeh aysubukiyyah sin yuysubuke
Tohuk lakal teetit sin gacsaah, Qhiyaamah ayro teetik sin yayyaaqe ayyaaqiyyah
Kaadu Yalli baaxó fidó siinih abe
Farakka le gitittel tet bagul gexxoonuh
Nabii Nuuc: yi Rabbow diggah usun (boola le mara kinnuk) yamri cineeniih, le maaluu kee le xalay finqak sa tu kah osse wayta abbottii kee gaddaloola katyen iyye
Kaadu usun kaxxa uma maláh malsen
Kaadu sinni yallitteh qibaadá macabina sittak iyyen, kaadu Waddiiy, Suwaaqaay, Yaqhusuvy, Yaquuqh kee Nasri deqsitta numtinwellitteh qibaadá macabina sittak iyyen
Kaadu nummah maggo mara finqiseenihik ta daalimiinih finqak sah tu mossin iyye Nabii Nuuc isi Rabbik
Usun aben dambitteh sabbatah leet yunxuqsumeeniih, girá culsumen, tokkel usun Yallak kalah cateynit magennon
Kaadu Nabii Nuuc: yi Rabbow baaxô bagul koroosite marak inkittuy mutuccu iyya macabin iyye
Diggah atu ken cabtek ku naqoosa makkoyse loonuuh, maxalan umeynay kaxxa koroosannu le akke waytek
Nabii Nuuc: yi Rabbow yoo kee yi xaleynaay, yi buxá moominiinih anuk cule maraa kee, lab moominiin kee say moominiinih inkih dambi cabaay, daalimiinih baatik sa tu mossin iyye

Nabiyow! ixxic: Yallak wacyi yol obsimeech diggah jinnik horta yakke mari qhuraan yok ankaciseeh, yoo nummayseh, tokkel usun sinni marâ fanah gacen waqdi: nanu diggah qajiibik (cakkumuk) yan qhuraan noobbeeh ankacisne keenik iyyen
Tama Qhuraan cakkii kee maqaanê fanah seecaah, meqe gita sinaamah yascasse, tokkel nanu kaa nummasneeh, ninni Rabbit agleh hebeltohim mahaynaay kaah abna qibaadat tu ma nasgalla
Kaadu diggah ni Rabbih nabna fayya itteeh, usuk barra ma haysitinnaay, xalay ma haysitinna iyyen
Kaadu ni toogimayti (ibliis kinnuk) Yallak cakki gitak xeeruk raqta maxco axcuk suge, yalli barraa kee baxa le iyye waqdi
Kaadu diggah, nanu seehadaa kee jinni Yallal dirab heewaytam nekkele
Kaadu diggah seehadak labha jinnik labha magansitak teneeh, jinni conxóo kee caddoktatur keenih osisak yen
Diggah, seehadâ koros tekkeleh isin kah tekkelen innah jinnow Yalli rabteemik num ugse weelem
Kaadu jinni: diggah nanu qaran gufnam fanneeh, gibdi malaykay kaa dacrissaa kee dabiitittek kibbiimeh neh suge iyye
Kaadu diggah, nanu ahak duma qaraanak elle daffeyna arooca luk sugne kay xaagu ankacisnuh, tokkel taway too xaagu ankacisam faxa num dabiitay kaa qambaala geele
Diggah, nanu (jinni butta kinnuk) Yalli baaxol yan marah faxem umaané kinnim kee hinnay ken Rabbi keenih faxem maqaané kinnim manaaxiga
Kaadu diggah meqe maray Yallak meesita net yaniih, wohuk kalah yan mari net yanih butta buttay sissinih anuk
Kaadu jinni iyyeh; diggah nanu Yalla baaxô bagul taanise waynaah kudimil kaak assaqqee waynam nismiteh nee digaalam faxek

Kaadu diggah, nanu qhuraanay massa le gitâ fanah tirri sinam haa noobbe waqdi kaa nummasneh tokkel isi Rabbi nummayse num abite maqaaneh daggoysiyyak ma meesitaay dulmih abe umaanek fulah tu kaat osisaanamak mameesita
Kaadu diggah;nanu garab muslimiinih kak yaniih, garab korosuh kak yan mara kinnino, Tokkel yuslume marah tu gactek, too mari meqe gita doorite mara
Kaadu koroosite marah tu gactek, jahannam giráh bocó yakken
Kaadu Yalli: insii kee jinni islaamaninnô gita yibbixeenih diggi elle axcinnoonuy maggo leek ken afaquk nen iyye
Wohul ken naqiyyirê gidah, isi Rabbih kassitit (Qhuraan kinnuk) derre cabe num, Yalli gibdi digaalá kaa culsa
Kaadu diggah, masaagid Yallih iimik kay addal kaak kalihim maqbudinaay qibaad kaah caglisa
Kaadu diggah, Yallih naqsi Nabii Mucammad fraseo isi Rabbi yaqbuduh soole waqdi jinni kay amol sittak bagul sitta qoxxisam akke raarra hee Qhuraan kaak ankacisuh
Nabiyow korosuk:cagalah anu inni Rabbi aqbudeeh agleh inkittu kaat mahaa qibaadál keenik ixxic
Nabiyow tama korosuk: diggah anu umaane siinik kalam maduudaay maqaane siinih baaham maduuda keenik ixxic
Nabiyow diggah, Yallih digaalak num yoo macataay, kaak kalah eleelita mara mageya keenik ixxic
Kinnih immay anu Yalli yoo edde amriseemih gudduysiyyaa kee yoo edde ruube farmooma sin gudduysam duuda, kaadu yallaa kee kay farmoytih amri cine num diggaluk jahannam girá le, umman tet addal waarak
Koros edde tan umaanek ma katta digaalák elle xagnisimeenim ubullu haytam fanah, tokkel usun too digaalá ken xagta waqdi aaxige lon cateynak boola leeh, ixxuk dagna lem kinni mara
Nabiyow ama korosuk isin digaalak elle xagnisimteenim xayim kinnim kee hinnay yi Rabbi xer wakti kah abem kinnim anu maaxiga keenik ixxic
Yalli qellittam yaaxigiiy, isih qellisem num mayaybulla
Usuk farmoytiitik isi farmoh dooreeh edde leedeeh yikcine farmoyta akke waytek, tokkel Yalli isi farmoytah fooca le gambii kee derre le gambik jinnik kaa dacrissa malayka kaah ruuba

Yallih farmoyti yaaxigê gidah, Yallih farmoytittey kaak duma rubsumte sinni Rabbih farmooma diggal gudduyseenimkeh, kaadu ken garil enni ittam Yalli marot yabbixe isi ixxigat, kaadu kullim looweeh ixxu kak gacseh woo hiimik tu kaak maqellitta
Kee isi sarot yambududow! (Nabii kinnuk)
Bar inkih salaatah sol barak dagom akke waytek
Barak garab sol, hinnay garabak dagom cab
Hinnay garabat osisaay, Qhuraan caatih cubbusak akriy
Nabiyow Diggah Nanu qilsi maxco (Qhuraan kinnuk) kol oobisenno
Diggah barak gimo aban salat kee qibaada sorkocobbaxa kaxxam raatissaah maxcô baxxaqqaa kee diggah aysuk raqta
Diggah laqo maggo agxe lito
Nabiyow ku Rabbih migaq cusaay, isi qibaadah kaâ fanah aggiriqiyyah iggiriqqiy
Usuk ayrô mawqaa kee ayrô kormâ Rabbi, kaak sa cakkil yaqbuden Yalli mayanak, toysa keltiyyah kaal kelit
Kaadu koros koo kee ku diinik ittaamal isbiraay qaxmeqe cabtih ken cab
Kaadu Nabiyow yoo kee tama yaayoota dirabboysa maray niqmatat yani ittah cabaay! Dago wakti keenih ab
Diggah usun ni garil axoowaa kee jaciim deqgsitta girá lon
Kaadu uma maaqoy serko ley katlak oobe waytaa kee ken qansarissa digaalá lon
Baaxoó kee qaleelá tangayye ayróy, qaleelá caxitta burta takke
Diggah nanu makki korosey farmoytay (Nabii Mucammad csati kinnuk) sin taamoomil sumaaqita siinî fanah rubne, firqawnâ fanah farmoyta (Nabii Muusa kinnuk) kah rubne innaah
Tokkel firqawni too farmoyta cineeh, gibdi digaaláh kaa digaalle
Toysa sinni nafsi too digaalak mannal catetton, meesi gibdah urru amqadoytit abta ayró, (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) tengeddeenik
Woo ayro meesî gibdah qaran qanxixah, Yalli is tamaatu waytaamah hee xagni yamaatuwaam raq mali
Diggah ta aayoota sinaamah kassiisik, toysa qakkaloowaah, isi nafsih maqaané faxe num isi Rabbî fanah gita yabbaxay Yallak meesii kee taaqatal

Nabiyow! diggah ku Rabbi atu barti salaatah waqdik teyna barak sidiica afak namma afak daguk raqtam kaak soltaah, aka adda garab kaak soltaah, aka adda kaadu sidocaytoh afa kaak soltam yaaxigeh, ku kataysiisik hortay kolluk tanî luk, yalli usuk bar kee laqo takkeh gide yaaxigeeh usuk ken waadoysa, yalli isin bar inkih salaatah soolak xintaanam duude waytaanam yeexegeeh, qafu siinih kak abeeh siinil xabbacoyseh, toysa barti salaatal qhuraanak siinih xabbacowtem akriya, yalli siinik biyaakita maray barti salaatah soolam duude waa siinit aneelem yeexegeh, kaadu aka maray yallih muxxo (rizqhi kinnuk) gurrusay baaxô bagul kabxah (tellemmo kinnuk) yangayyee kee aka maray yallih gital gaaduh yangicille siinik aneelem yeexegeh, toysa barti salaatal qhuraanak siinih xabbacowtem akriya, kaadu fardi salat elle faxxiima'nnal abaay, zakay waajibik siinil tani acuwa, kaadu yallih fooca edde faxak sadqhat ottocowwa, kaadu simaamey sinni nafsih maqaanek tatrussu hayteenem is yallih xaqul isin addunyal tatrusseenimik kayrih aysuk raqtaah galtoh nabuk raaqak tet geetton, kaadu yallak dambi cabti esserita, diggah yalli dambi cabtili xuwawli kinnik
Kee bududet yan Nabiyow
Ugutaay sinam Yallih digaalák meesis
Kaadu isi Rabbi eyneb
Kaadu isi sara najaasak saytunnos
Kaadu Yallat agleyta haanam kee raqqate umaaneenak exxer
Kaadu tu edde tassamgguh acwa maabin
Kaadu ku Rabbih kacanu edde geytu waytaamal isbir
Tokkel ugut Baantá fooximtu wayta waqdi
Too ayró gibdi ayró
Too ayró korosul xabcá mali
Nabiyow! Yoo kee inâ bagut dibuk anuk gineh an num (waliid ibnul mughiira kinnuk) sittah cab
Kaadu maggo maalu kah ecee num
Kaadu kaallih geytimta xaylo kah ecee num
Addunyal mano xabbacoysiyyah kah xabbacoyseeh farakka kah hee num
Tohuk lakal xalay kee maalu kaah ossam qaagitaah sangeela
Caagid usuk elle yakkale inna hinna, diggah usuk naayoota cirdih angadduk suge
Saytutticin qaley girák tani yawqeemih kaa dirkiseyyo
Diggah usuk isi nafsil cubbuseeh, massoyseh Nabii kee Qhuraan xagitik iyyuwaam
Tokkel usuk abbarsimehik mannal massoysee ta uma xagit
Tohuk lakal abbarsimehik mannal massoyseeh ta uma xagit
Tohuk lakal usuk cubbii kee malat qagteh
Tohuk lakal ceereeh fooca kaxxa ribiyyah ribe
Tohuk lakal cakkit derre cabeeh, kaxxamariiniteh
Tokkel Qhuraanak: ah tu hinna Mucammad naharsi marak baahe baab akke waytek iyye
Ah tu hinna seehadâ maxcó akke waytek iyye
Saqhar deqsitta girá kaa culseyyo, teetit cararaah tet digaalá tammoysuh
Saqhar kinni girá maca koo tiysixxigeeh
Is xagaral cado macabtaay, lafa macabta carrissa tet akke waytek
Is xagar carissaah, dattossah
Taban kee sagaal tet amol yan malaykak

Kaadu girá dacrisa mara malayka akke waytek maabinnino, Kaadu maabinnino ken ixxu koroosite marah aqayyaareey, kitab kah yontocowwime mari yasmitê gideh iyyaanam akke waytek, kaadu yeemene mari iimaan elle ossituuy, kitab kah yontocowwime maraa kee moominiin elle agaywaagite waytu, kaadu sorkocobbaxittet biyak le maraa kee koros Yalli tahat ceelalloh maca faxee ittuh, Tonnaah Yalli isih faxe mara makkoysaah isih faxe mara tirri haa, ku Rabbih qandé takkeh gide taaxigê matan kaa akke waytek, girá tu hinna is seehadah kassis takkemkeh iyyaanam akke waytek
Koros elle takkale inna hinna, Yalli alsál xiibite
Kaadu Bari derre caba waqdil xiibite
Maaci ifá waqdil xiibite
Diggah, is (girá kinnuk) nabaamak tiyak teyná
Is seehadah meesissoh tan
Siinik faxe mari maqaanél taturay hinnay umaanél wadirrooway
Ummaan nafsi abiteemit axawah yan
Migdi maray moominiinih yani akke waytek
Jannat addal sitta esseraanah
Umeyniitiy gira cultê caalat
Saqhar deqsitta girá maca sin culussee keenik iyyan
Addunyal salat aba marâ lih salat abak masuginnino iyyan
Kaadu tu mali askamuk masuginnino
Kaadu umaanet giirisa marâ lih giirisak sugne
Kaadu galtóh ayró (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) dirabboysak sugne
Asmat (Raba kinnuk) net xikki iyyam fanah
Tokkel shafaaqat abá marih shafaaqatta tu keenih maxiqta
A koros kassitit (Qhuraan kinnuk) derre kah cabtam maca lee
Gilsime dibookolih innah
Lubaakak kude waqdi
Wonna hinnay keenik kulli seehadayti fakut tan kitooba iseh tantacawwimeeh geyam faxa
Tonna hinnay diggah, usun ellecaboh ayrók ma meesitan
Nummah ta Qhuraan usuk kassiisi elle kaskassoowa marah
Tokkel kassitam faxa mari kaal kaskassoowah
Kaal (Qhuraan kinnuk) kaskassowtam matan Yalli kah faxe num akke waytek, usuk (Yalla kinnuk) kak meesitoonu meesi caglitaah, dambi cabti caglita Rabbi kinni
Diggah Yalli Qhiyaamah ayról xiibite
Kaadu diggah moominti nafsiy isi yassacakkel xiibite
Seehadayti (korosta kinnuk) kay lafoofi gaaboyse weennom yakka lee
Yeey, nanu tet gaaboysenno, kay feeraarih exaaxi massosnam duudak
Tonna hinnay, seehadayti isi foocal tanim dirabboysam faxa
Qhiyaamah ayró maa waqdii iyyeh esseraamal? (kah esseram anqasa)
Tokkel Mablá baditta waqdi
Kaadu alsá diifi duugumta waqdi
Kaadu ayroó kee alsá gaaboysimtaah inki arac yawqen waqdi
Seehadayti: woo ayró (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) anke kudnaa anke eleelitnaa iyya
Tonna hinnay eleelitan rike matan
Woo ayró idyaa kee madab ku Rabbih xaqu cagalah
Seehadaytuh woo ayró taamak yuysukumem kee wadirroysem warsintah
Tonna hinnay, seehadayti isi nafsil isih sumaaqita
Kaadu Abeh yan uma taamak faxem malkitaamah woo malkit kaah xiqam mali
Nabiyow wacyi kol ooba waqdi qhuraanat isi arraba masgayyin, raqsat kaak tasissikeemih fayxih
Diggah nel tan kaa liilil kaa gaabosnam, kee kay kiraati
Kaadu Nabiyow ni farmoyti jibriil gitak qhuraan kol nakriye waqdi, kaa ankacisaay tibbi ixxic, tohuk lakal usuk koo elle barse innal ikriy
Tohuk lakal diggah kay baxxaqisiyyi nel yan
Korosey caagid Isin elle takkalen inna hinna, ugut kee galtok tu matana ittaanamal, nummah isin addunyaa kee tet bilhada kicinton
Kaadu isin akeera cabtaanaah, teetih mataamittan
Woo ayró meqe marih Foocitte (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) iftah
Isi Rabbî fanah wagitta.(woh meqe mara kinnuk)
Kaadu woo ayró uma marih foocitte ribbimtah
Kaxxa umaanéy xiiron lafoofi teetik edde taddigillee teetit akke lem tasmiteh
Nummah rooci (coxxo) kaxkaxxo gufa waqdi
Iyyi kaa daylisaa iyyan
Kaadu diggah usuk (raba num) addunyak baxsimam yasmiteh. (raba kinnuk)
Kaadu sarba sarbat makitta
Woo ayro (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) seehadak beyto ku Rabbî fanah takke
Tokkel korosti Yallih farmoytaa kee qhuraan manummaysinnaay, salat maabinna
Takkay immay qhuraan dirabboyseeh, iimaanat derre cabe
Tohuk lakat isi marâ fanah kaxxamariinitak gexe
Finqi koh yan, kaadu finqi koh yan
Tohuk lakal finqi koh yan kaadu finqi koh yan
Seehadayti foyyah annaak calayah yanitay kaa iyyoonuwaanam yakkalee
Seehadayti daacoyti tiffoytay maxaxat caxaanak yekkeh manannaa
Tohuk lakal dabloytak yekkeeh, Yalli kaa gineeh, kaa masssoyseeh, weelo kaa yeymeegqe
Tokkel namma qaynat kaa abé lab num kee say numuh anuk
Yallay toh abe rabtem yaynuwweemih qamal geytoli hinnaa? (yeey kinnih)
Nummah seehadaytut rooci haanak duma dabaanak xer (der) daban kaal tatre, usuk cusaanamay xagar kak xagaanah tuh suge kalah
Diggah nanu seehadaytu lab num kee say numuk yengele daacoytih tiffak kaa ginne kaa naqayyaruh, (mokkorruh) tokkel yaabbeeh yable seehadaytu kaa abne
Diggah nanı tirtô gitaa kee makô gita kaah baxxaqisneh moomintuy faatita akkee kee korostay yangadde akke yakke immay
Diggah nanu korosuh, silsilootay ibitte keenik edde debraanaa kee, ogoogay fillittee kee gaboobi ittat keenik edde yaxeenii kee, saqiir deqsitta giráy ken carrisa keenih massosne
Diggah meqe mari galoosay gocoyuk (kamri) kibuk taniy agleh kaafuur lek yaaquben
Ama gocoyuy yaaqubeeniy kaafuur agleh edde yani, is daray Yallih naqoosa kak taaqube, usun ayfuxxukiyyah tet yayfuxxukeeniih, faxxa heen kabul tet beyan
Ama mari axbuux (nadri) duudusaah, Qhiyaamah ayróy umaané kak fixiixih tani Yallih digaalák meesitan
Kaadu usun tumaliiy qayxixxuu kee seewaytu maaqó yaskamen tet kacanu luk
Cagalah nanu sin kah naskamem Yallih foocih taaga, galtoo kee faatit siinik elle mafanna iyyan
Diggah nanu ninni Rabbik meesitna, gibdah fooci edde ribbiima (kamadima) ayrók (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk)
Tokkel Yalli woo ayróh umaanék ken reebiseeh, fooci ifuu kee wallé (farcat) keenih yecee
Kaadu yisbireenimih sabbatah jannat kee cariiril ken galte
Kay addal qaraakiyil kelitak, ayró mayablaanaay, kaxxa xabca mayablan
Kaadu Kay cooxih silaaló keenit xayyowtah ken silaalisak, kaadu ama cooxih mexexih mafaala xabbacoowiyyah keenih xabbacowta
Kaadu jannatti urruy ken yakdume keenit meekisah, mingiilay lakqok tanii kee kobboyyaayiy bililleelak (karaarit kinnuk) tani
Bililleelay lakqok taniy usun elle faxaanah gidel kiyaasiyyah kiyaaseeni
Kaadu kay addal galoosay gocoyuk kibuk taniy agleh zanjabiil lek ken yafqen
Kay addal tan daray, salsabiil deqsittak yaaquben
Kaadu jannatti urruy elle yanin caalatal elle waara keenit meekita, ken table waqdi luuluy fixiixiseeni ken takka le
Kaadu jannatak faxe ikkeey wagittay, tokkel niqmatay weeloysoonu duude waanaa kee kaxxa Reeda table
Anxaxin saray xabcin cariirik yanii kee gibdi cariirik yan sari ken xagaral yaniih, qado lakqok tan gabâ biriitat (cagooluk) billiiman, kaadu ken Rabbi yaaqubeenimiy saytuniy taahirik tanik ken yafqe
Diggah ta galtó sin meqe taamoomih galto kinniih, sin taamoomi addunyal yalli raabiteeh yikcineh yan taamak sugte keenik iyyan
Diggah Nabiyow Qhuraan oobisiyyah nanu ninnih kol oobisne
Nabiyow Ku Rabbih meklal isbiraay, korosuk dambit kaxaxah yan marih yab moggolinaay hinnay koroosannuu kee maxqawitit caddok tatreh yan marih yab moggolin
Kaadu ku Rabbih migaq Carraay, saaku xag
Kaadu barak tut kaah kummaataay, barak xer waktit salat kaah ab
Diggah tama mari (koros kinnuk) sissik tiya (addunya kinnuk) kicnoonuuh, qilsi ayroy ellecabol ken qambalta cabaanah (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk)
Nanu ken ginneeh gino keenik karriqqi hayne, kaadu nanu bayisnam fannek, bayissi ken hayneh ken innah yan maray kayrih keenik yayse ciggiilisiyyah ciggiilisenno
Diggah tama suurá seehadah kassiisi, toysa isi nafsih maqaané faxe num, isi Rabbih gita yabbixe, iimaan kee meqe taamál
Isin caagiidak hebeltô caagidiy faxxaana manton, Yalli faxeh akķke waytek, diggah Yalli isi ginô caaloota yaaxigi, abba haamal naggaar kinni
Yalli isi naqoosak isih faxe mara isi Racmat (jannat kinnuk) culsa, kaadu daalimiinih (koros kinnuk) akeeral qansarissa digaalá massoyse
Yalli ittâ lakleh itta kataata caacayal xiibite
Edde luk gibdi caacayay hawwug iyyal xiibite
Kaadu yalli malaykay qubulta usuk faxa ikke beytay fixiixisiyyah kaa fixiixissal xiibite
Edde luk yalli malaykay cakkii kee deedalaay, calaalii kee caraamu ittak baxissam kay xaquk luk obtal xiibite
Edde luk malaykay wacyi Yallih ambiyaa kee farmoytiitil oobissal xiibite
Seehada Yallal malkit geewaytuh hinnay meesisso keenih yakkuh Yallih digaalák
Cagalah Qhiyaamâ caagidik isin elle xagnisinteenim akkelem Raqmali
Tokkel Cutuk duugumaah diifi kak gexa waqdi
Kaadu qaran qanxixaah, fakkiima waqdi
Kaadu qaleelá riira (bula) takke waqdi
Kaadu Yallih farmoytit kee ken ummattâ fanat mekla edde aban wakti muggaqsime waqdi
Farmoytit edde waddiroysimtem Maa ayroóy
Ginô fan edde meklaanaah edde Baxsan ayró, kah xagnisimeenim (woh Qhiyaamah ayró)
Kaadu seehadaytow maca koo tiysixxigeeh Baxsi ayroó kee tet gibdaabini kinnim
Qhiyaamah ayro dirabboyse marah woo ayro fingi yan
Naharsi marak Yallih farmoytit dirabboyse mara mafinqisinninoo
Tohuk lakal wadirsi mara ken kataysenno
Tonnah abba heenno umeyniitik (koros kinnuk)
Yallih inkittinaanee dirabboyse marah woo ayro (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) finqi yan
Seehaday boola le leek (daacoyta kinnuk) Sin ma gininninoo
Edde luk sabhalal leeh dacayri le aracay (saynumih maxax kinnuk) bica let kaa ma hanninoo
Yallih xaqul Yimixxige waktî fanah
tokkel kaa ginnam dudneeh, yayse dudda lem nee
Ni dudda dirabboysa marah woo ayro Finqi yan
Baaxó aracay inkih sin yasgalleeh yabbixe maabinninoo
Siinik nuwwaamaay, rabteemih inkih
Kaadu fayyale qaleelá teetil mahanninoo diggi tet haytuh, kaadu coboy leey salfa lek sin mafqinninoo
Ni niqmat yangaddee marah woo ayro Finqi yan
Korosuk qhiyaamah ayró: jahannam giráh digaaláy dirabboysak sugteenî fanah gexa keenik iyyan
Gexaay iraawita jahannam giráh qiiriy sidiica luddalê fanah
Usuk Ma silaalisaay, giráh huurik xiqam malik
Diggah is kaxxa qarih gide yakke xinkilliq qambissa
Usuk (xinkilliq kinnuk) Dat caawin gaala ceela
Yallih meesisso dirabboyse marah woo ayro Finqi yan
Ta ayró dirableelá yabtaamih dudda mali. (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk)
Yaabaanamih idni keenih mayantacawwima edde yawqoonuh
Tama ayro dirabboysa marah woo ayro Finqi yan
Qhiyaamah ayró korosuk iyyaanah: tah ginô fan edde meklaanaah baxsan ayró, sin kee naharsi mara edde gaabosneh
Toysa Isin malá teelleenik, yi digaalak edde cattimtoonuh yoh malsita
Ellecaboh ayro dirabboysa marah woo ayro Finqi yan
Diggah Yallak meesite mari jannatal silalwaa kee daroorih addal yan
Kaadu caxâ mixuk faxxa haanamih addal yanin
Keenik iyyaanah: akumaay aquba rufto luk, addunyal abbaasitten meqe taamah sabbatah
Diggah nanu tonnal galatna meqem abite mara.(moominiin kinnuk)
Jannatti niqmat dirabboyse marah woo ayro Finqi yan
Yalli korosuk iyyah: addunyal meqem akumaay dago wakti teetit hataka diggah isin umeyniitik, Yallat agleyta hayteenimih sabbatah
Cisab kee galtoh ayro dirabboyse marah woo ayro Finqi yan
Kaadu Yallah salat abaay kaah rammita keenik iyyeenik, salat kaah maabaanaay, kaah marammitan
Yallih aayoota dirabboyse marah woo ayro Finqi yan
Toysa ta qhuraanay Yallih yab kinnih iyyal aamine weenik, maakitaabaay, maayaabaay kaak wadir elle yaaminoonu waanam
